title: Pbe patch note problems
body:
For a odd reason the pbe account that i created works fine , but then the patch notes Are not updating, They only update when the go to the live servers, for example yesterday to 2 weeks ago the pbe patch notes were on 7.16, they never changed, then today it NOW changes to patch 7.17, th same day and time the live servers got the changes

What is going on, why is the pbe patch notes the same as the live servers and how do i fix it.

p.s Im on a mac so fixing may be different

replies.body: Weird.....so it turns out that patch 7.18 IS actually on PBE currently, it's just that they don't quite yet have the 7.18 patch notes drafted yet so they haven't updated them yet.
What do you mean by "it's just that they don't quite yet have the 7.18 patch notes drafted yet so they haven't updated them yet."

I just meant that they haven't written the final draft of the patch notes yet, so they don't have the notes to put on the client yet. Once they have all of it written up and prepared they'll update the patch notes.

So it just updated twice, yet it is still oddly on patch 7.17, Are they still drafting it, or is it just the updates that they do often?
 Then again how do i fix that patching problem, it is oddly weird
